languages.text: "Как и {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}любой арбитр{/d}, я знаю Инъюнкта Кардинал до последней запятой. Не было и дня, чтобы я не повторял священные положения от и до — они высечены в моей памяти так же четко, как на стенах крепостей Арбитес и на гильзах наших патронов. Я скорее свое имя забуду, чем хоть слово из Инъюнкта Кардинал".

"Like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}any Arbitrator{/d}, I know the Injuncta Cardinal to the letter. Not a day has passed when I didn't recite the sacred laws from beginning to end — they are carved into my memory as distinctly as they are into the walls of our precinct fortresses and the casings of our ammunition. I would sooner forget my own name than a single word of the Injuncta Cardinal."
languages.original_text: "Как и {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}любой арбитр{/d}, я знаю Инъюнкта Кардинал до последней запятой. Я скорее свое имя забуду, чем хоть слово из Инъюнкта Кардинал".

languages.text: 「{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}アービトレイター{/d}として当然のことですが、私はインユンクタ・カーディナルを一字一句正確に覚えています。一日たりとも、その聖なる法を最初から最後まで唱えなかった日はありません。その文言は、私たちの記憶に刻み込まれているのと同じくらい、管区要塞の壁や弾薬の薬莢にも刻み込まれているのです。自分の名前を忘れるよりも先に、インユンクタ・カーディナルのひとつの言葉すら忘れることなどあり得ません」
languages.original_text: "Like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}any Arbitrator{/d}, I know the Injuncta Cardinal to the letter. Not a day has passed when I didn't recite the sacred laws from beginning to end — they are carved into my memory as distinctly as they are into the walls of our precinct fortresses and the casings of our ammunition. I would sooner forget my own name than a single word of the Injuncta Cardinal."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターとして当然のことですが、私はインユンクタ・カーディナルを一字一句正確に覚えています。一日たりとも、その聖なる法を最初から最後まで唱えなかった日はありません。その文言は、私たちの記憶に刻み込まれているのと同じくらい、管区要塞の壁や弾薬の薬莢にも刻み込まれているのです。自分の名前を忘れるよりも先に、インユンクタ・カーディナルのひとつの言葉すら忘れることなどあり得ません」

languages.text: "Wie jeder {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Arbitrator{/d} kann ich die Injuncta Cardinal auswendig. Es vergeht kein Tag, an dem ich die heiligen Gesetze nicht von Anfang bis Ende rezitiere – sie sind in mein Gedächtnis ebenso deutlich eingegraben wie in die Wände unserer Revierfestungen und die Hülsen unserer Munition. Ich würde eher meinen eigenen Namen vergessen als auch nur ein Wort der Injuncta Cardinal."
languages.original_text: "Like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}any Arbitrator{/d}, I know the Injuncta Cardinal to the letter. Not a day has passed when I didn't recite the sacred laws from beginning to end — they are carved into my memory as distinctly as they are into the walls of our precinct fortresses and the casings of our ammunition. I would sooner forget my own name than a single word of the Injuncta Cardinal."

traits.locale_text: "Wie jeder Arbitrator kann ich die Injuncta Cardinal auswendig. Es vergeht kein Tag, an dem ich die heiligen Gesetze nicht von Anfang bis Ende rezitiere – sie sind in mein Gedächtnis ebenso deutlich eingegraben wie in die Wände unserer Revierfestungen und die Hülsen unserer Munition. Ich würde eher meinen eigenen Namen vergessen als auch nur ein Wort der Injuncta Cardinal."

languages.text: « {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Comme tous les arbitrators{/d}, je maîtrise à la perfection l'Injuncta Cardinal. Il ne se passe pas un jour sans que je récite les lois sacrées dans leur entièreté. Elles sont gravées dans mon esprit, comme sur les murs des postes de l'Arbites ou sur nos munitions. Je pense que j'oublierai mon nom avant d'oublier un seul mot de l'Injuncta Cardinal. »
languages.original_text: "Like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}any Arbitrator{/d}, I know the Injuncta Cardinal to the letter. Not a day has passed when I didn't recite the sacred laws from beginning to end — they are carved into my memory as distinctly as they are into the walls of our precinct fortresses and the casings of our ammunition. I would sooner forget my own name than a single word of the Injuncta Cardinal."

traits.locale_text: « Comme tous les arbitrators, je maîtrise à la perfection l'Injuncta Cardinal. Il ne se passe pas un jour sans que je récite les lois sacrées dans leur entièreté. Elles sont gravées dans mon esprit, comme sur les murs des postes de l'Arbites ou sur nos munitions. Je pense que j'oublierai mon nom avant d'oublier un seul mot de l'Injuncta Cardinal. »

languages.text: «{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Como cualquier Arbitrator{/d}, me sé la Injuncta Cardinal al pie de la letra. No pasa un solo día sin que recite los mandamientos sagrados de cabo a rabo; los tengo tan grabados en la memoria como lo están en los muros de nuestras fortalezas judiciales y los casquillos de nuestras municiones. Antes olvidaría mi propio nombre que una sola palabra de la Injuncta Cardinal».
languages.original_text: "Like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}any Arbitrator{/d}, I know the Injuncta Cardinal to the letter. Not a day has passed when I didn't recite the sacred laws from beginning to end — they are carved into my memory as distinctly as they are into the walls of our precinct fortresses and the casings of our ammunition. I would sooner forget my own name than a single word of the Injuncta Cardinal."

traits.locale_text: «Como cualquier Arbitrator, me sé la Injuncta Cardinal al pie de la letra. No pasa un solo día sin que recite los mandamientos sagrados de cabo a rabo; los tengo tan grabados en la memoria como lo están en los muros de nuestras fortalezas judiciales y los casquillos de nuestras municiones. Antes olvidaría mi propio nombre que una sola palabra de la Injuncta Cardinal».

languages.text: “任何一位{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}法务官{/d}都对《红衣主教训谕》的内容了如指掌。我每天都会从头到尾背诵这些神圣的律法，没有一天懈怠。这些内容清晰地铭刻在我的记忆之中，正如铭刻在弹壳上与堡垒的墙壁上一样。我宁愿忘记自己的名字，也不愿忘记《红衣主教训谕》中任何一个字。”
languages.original_text: "Like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}any Arbitrator{/d}, I know the Injuncta Cardinal to the letter. Not a day has passed when I didn't recite the sacred laws from beginning to end — they are carved into my memory as distinctly as they are into the walls of our precinct fortresses and the casings of our ammunition. I would sooner forget my own name than a single word of the Injuncta Cardinal."

traits.locale_text: “任何一位法务官都对《红衣主教训谕》的内容了如指掌。我每天都会从头到尾背诵这些神圣的律法，没有一天懈怠。这些内容清晰地铭刻在我的记忆之中，正如铭刻在弹壳上与堡垒的墙壁上一样。我宁愿忘记自己的名字，也不愿忘记《红衣主教训谕》中任何一个字。”

languages.text: "Her {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Yargıcı{/d} gibi ben de Esas Buyrukları harfi harfine bilirim. Kutsal kanunları baştan sona okumadığım tek bir gün bile yoktur. Bu Buyruklar, karakol kalelerimizin duvarlarına ve mühimmat kovanlarımıza ne kadar belirgin bir şekilde kazınmışsa hafızama da o şekilde kazınmıştır. Esas Buyrukların tek bir kelimesini bile unutmaktansa kendi adımı unutmayı yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: "Like {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}any Arbitrator{/d}, I know the Injuncta Cardinal to the letter. Not a day has passed when I didn't recite the sacred laws from beginning to end — they are carved into my memory as distinctly as they are into the walls of our precinct fortresses and the casings of our ammunition. I would sooner forget my own name than a single word of the Injuncta Cardinal."
